@Module.Name: Predict
@Module.Description: This module is a prediction model, predicting what will appear after clicking each components on current screen

Output.<div id=1 class='com.android.chrome:id/h: Access the help and feedback section
Output.<div id=4 class='com.android.chrome:id/r: Access the list of recent tabs
Output.<div id=11 class='com.android.chrome:id/: Update Chrome with a newer version available

@Module.Name: Select
@Module.Description: This module is a selection model, selecting the 5 possible component without relativity ranking to be acted on catering to user's intent
@Module.Note: This individual module only select 5 highly related components,without ranking them,and without analyzing the correctness of the components aligning with user's content

Output.<div id=5 class='com.android.chrome:id/a: This component represents the 'Bookmarks' option in the Chrome menu, which is directly related to managing bookmarks.
Output.<div id=2 class='com.android.chrome:id/p: This component represents the 'Settings' option in the Chrome menu. It is worth exploring as it may contain options related to managing bookmarks.
Output.<div id=4 class='com.android.chrome:id/r: This component represents the 'Recent tabs' option in the Chrome menu. While not directly related to managing bookmarks, it is worth exploring as it may contain related options or settings.
Output.<div id=7 class='com.android.chrome:id/o: This component represents the 'History' option in the Chrome menu. While not directly related to managing bookmarks, it is worth exploring as it may contain related options or settings.
Output.<div id=9 class='com.android.chrome:id/n: This component represents the 'New Incognito tab' option in the Chrome menu. While not directly related to managing bookmarks, it is worth exploring as it may contain related options or settings.

@Module.Name: Plan
@Module.Description: This module is a plan module, planning the next action based on the selected components, whether click or edit

candidate1.reason: To access the bookmarks menu and manage bookmarks.

candidate2.reason: To access the settings menu, not relevant to managing bookmarks.

candidate3.reason: To access the recent tabs menu, not relevant to managing bookmarks.

candidate4.reason: To access the history menu, not relevant to managing bookmarks.

candidate5.reason: To open a new incognito tab, not relevant to managing bookmarks.

@Module.Name: Evaluate
@Module.Description: This module is an evaluation module, evaluating the selected components of their contribution to fulfilling the user's intent

@Module.Name: Decide
@Module.Description: This module is a decision module, deciding the final action based on the evaluation result, whether complete or wrong or go on

Output.reason: The user has navigated to the 'Bookmarks' section of the Chrome App, but the task to actually manage (add, remove, or organize) bookmarks is not yet complete.
